text:
Jeno menghela nafas. Malas berdebat dengan chenle karena ia tau akhirnya ia akan kalah. "Lebih baik punya istri bisu daripada punya istri jalang" lelaki cantik itu dengan santainya menyeruput segelas cokelat hangatnya tanpa mempedulikan jeno yang kini menatapnya tajam
"Jangan panggil dia ja-"
"Lalu apa? Murahan" Chenle menatap jeno datar
Jeno mengehela nafasnya lagi. Ia tidak mengerti kenapa chenle bahkan ibunya mengatakan bahwa kekasihnya itu 'jalang'
Jisung hanya menyimak pembicaraan mereka berdua. Ia tidak ingin ikut campur jika chenle-nya sudah seperti ini, bisa-bisa ia kena juga
Hening kemudian. Tidak ada yang mau membuka pembicaraan, mereka sibuk dengan pikiran mereka masing-masing
Chenle berdiri dari duduknya, tau jika ia hanya memperkeruh suasana disini. Ia melangkah menuju tangga untuk naik ke lantai dua, ia lebih memilih berdiam diri dikamar
"Le mau kemana?"
trans:
Jeno sighed. Reluctantly arguing with Chenle because he knew he would not win. "It is better to have a mute wife than a tramp". That beautiful man casually sipped a glass of hot chocolate without paying attention to Jeno who now stared at him sharply.
"Don't call her a tra-"
"Then what? Slut" Chenle gave Jeno a flat stare.
Jeno sighed again. He didn't understand why Chenle and even his mom said that his girlfriend was a 'slut'
Jisung just listened to their conversation. He didn't want to get involved when Chenle was like this, he could get it too.
Silent afterwards. No one wanted to start a conversation, they were busy with their own thoughts.
Chenle sat up, knowing that he would make the situation worse. He walked to the stairs to go to the second floor, he chose to stay silent in his room.
"Le where are you going?"
